Sentencas: Cerium oxide-based materials are the most widely used electrolyte material for low-intermediate temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Sintering Behavior and Electrical Conductivity of Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 with Li2O Additives

Sentencas: In this study, the interaction between Li2O and CeO2 was calculated based on density functional theory (DFT).
Titulo: Sintering Behavior and Electrical Conductivity of Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 with Li2O Additives

Sentencas: The results showed that the sintering of CeO2 was positively affected by Li2O. Based on this result, the actual sintering process of Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 (GDC) with different concentration (0-5mol%) of Li2O additive was characterized through the sintering behavior and scanning electron microscope (SEM).
Titulo: Sintering Behavior and Electrical Conductivity of Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 with Li2O Additives

Sentencas: The electrochemical performance was also being investigated simultaneously.
Titulo: Sintering Behavior and Electrical Conductivity of Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 with Li2O Additives

Sentencas: The results show that the initial shrinkage temperature shifted to lower temperature significantly, and the temperature of the highest shrinkage rate also decreased with the increasing of the Li2O additive content.
Titulo: Sintering Behavior and Electrical Conductivity of Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 with Li2O Additives

Sentencas: The shrinking of GDC with 2.5mol% Li2O started at 650 degrees C, and the GDC electrolyte with higher than 99% relative density was obtained at a low sintering temperature of 900 degrees C.
Titulo: Sintering Behavior and Electrical Conductivity of Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 with Li2O Additives

Sentencas: The total electrical conductivity of GDC was improved with Li2O additive.
Titulo: Sintering Behavior and Electrical Conductivity of Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 with Li2O Additives

Sentencas: Meanwhile, the open circuit voltage of the corresponding single cell maintained nearly the same with pure GDC.
Titulo: Sintering Behavior and Electrical Conductivity of Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 with Li2O Additives

Sentencas: These preliminary results indicate that Li2O is a very effective sintering aid for cerium oxide-based electrolyte in SOFC.
Titulo: Sintering Behavior and Electrical Conductivity of Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 with Li2O Additives
